akn:section.akn:heading: New certificates of birth for change of gender designation.

akn:content.akn:p: The Registrar shall establish a new certificate of birth that reflects the new gender designation and, if applicable, the new name of an individual born in the District upon receipt of the following documents:
The Registrar shall establish, upon request, a new certificate of birth reflecting the new gender designation, new name, or name as previously amended, in these additional circumstances:
A new certificate of birth, issued in accordance with subsection (a) or (b) of this section, shall:

The original certificate of birth, along with any documents submitted pursuant to this section, shall be sealed and made available only upon the demand of the individual to whom the new certificate of birth was issued or an order of the Court.
